title: Health education curriculum; require school districts to incorporate instruction on domestic violence and dating violence prevention as component of.
subject: Education

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 37-13-134, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO REQUIRE PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICTS TO INCORPORATE AGE-APPROPRIATE INSTRUCTION ON THE PREVENTION OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE AND TEEN DATING VIOLENCE AS A COMPONENT OF ITS HEALTH EDUCATION CURRICULUM; TO PRESCRIBE THE CRITERIA TO BE CONSIDERED AS COMPONENTS OF THE INSTRUCTION THAT ARE DEVELOPMENTALLY APPROPRIATE AND CULTURALLY SENSITIVE; TO REQUIRE THE STATE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION OR PROVIDE TRAINING AND RESOURCES FOR EDUCATORS TO EFFECTIVELY DELIVER INSTRUCTION ON DOMESTIC VIOLENCE AND DATING VIOLENCE PREVENTION; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
